translations: [计]链接；链锁作用；用链量距离
用铁链锁住；束缚（chain 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Employ backward chaining to develop the class.
sentences.translation: 使用逆向链接来开发类。

sentences.sentence: So, method chaining will still work fine.
sentences.translation: 因此，方法链接(method chaining)仍然运作良好。

sentences.sentence: The example in Listing 8 shows explicit exception chaining.
sentences.translation: 清单8中所示的示例展示了显式异常链。
